overview:
Sandy is a partner with Pentech Ventures.

He has been involved in developing and commercialising innovations for over 19 years - and in VC since 2001.

He is currently on the boards of Metaforic, Velocix, Rapid-Mobile and OmniPerception.

Pentech only invest in software companies in the UK and Ireland - and Sandy’s particular interests are in Web technologies and Innovations, security, “Cloud” and virtualised computing and Mobile innovations.
